name: Haggard
tagline: Yet Another Digital Task Board Made In Oulu With Passion!
body:
### Welcome to Haggard home!
Haggard is a web-based task board with support of agile methods like Scrum or Kanban.
To try out the board, please navigate to Demo Board and log in with Guest account!

### Made in [Oulu](http://www.ouka.fi/oulu/english/) with Passion!
Inspired by Kanban core principle of work visualization, together with my great colleague, Heikki Hellgren (@drodil), 
we have developed Haggard in 2012-2014 as hobby project.
It attracted almost 1000 users and was used daily to support agile practices within company.

### Support or Contact
The Haggard OSS project is owned and maintained by [Maxim Abrosimov](http://fi.linkedin.com/pub/maxim-abrosimov/6/59/2a8/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
